mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM mtmydb.mtmy_orders_log a
where a.order_id=#{orderid} ORDER BY a.add_time desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_orders_operate_log( order_id, title, content, content_record, channel_flag, platform_flag, create_by, create_office_ids, create_date )VALUES( #{orderid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{contentRecord}, #{channelFlag}, #{platformFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createOfficeIds}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT id AS 'olid', order_id AS 'orderid', title, content, content_record AS 'contentRecord', channel_flag AS 'channelFlag', platform_flag AS 'platformFlag', create_by AS 'createBy.id', create_office_ids AS 'createOfficeIds', create_date AS 'createDate', (select name from trains.sys_user where id = create_by) AS 'createBy.name' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_orders_operate_log WHERE order_id = #{orderid}
